UX Designer

“One should aim not at being possible to understand, but at being impossible to misunderstand” - Quintilian

Hi there! I’m an UX Designer based in Santa Monica, CA.  I enjoy making nice things and making things nice.  Coming from a sales and business development background, let me help you tell your story and bridge the gap between the business and creative world.

Learn a bit more about my UX process or take a look at some work I’ve done.
